website_summaries.verdict: This option gets high praise for its looks and ease of installation.
pros: We love how this elegant, high-quality fixture requires zero assembly and installs easily
Choice of multiple colors and configurations
cons: Some customers report that this option arrives damaged or with scuff marks

customer_reviews.title: Ah~MAZE~Ing!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot even begin to tell you how gorgeous this chandelier is. I'm currently remodeling my bedroom. I hated the ceiling fan. I mean, it was pretty and nice, but I wanted something extraordinary. I took a chance on this......I am beyond thrilled. It's beautiful, feminine, a tad bit gothic, it's perfection. I cannot stop staring at it. It was super easy to put together, as almost all of it is assembled for you. I could go on and on about how great it is, but I have a bedroom to finish decorating. Buy this! Or dont, because if you don't, I'll be the only cool chick with badass bedroom lighting.
customer_reviews.author: PussyCatJustice

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the 3 arm in clear...love it. Just what I was looking for..because every tack room needs a chandelier...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 3 arm in clear ..love it. Just what I was looking for... Because every tack room needs a chandelier.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Darling!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely darling! Turned my closet into a boutique. The 5 arm chandelier provides the perfect amount of light in my 8' x 8' walk-in closet. Installed very easily-no need for an electrician. It's very light and sparkly. Recommend adjusting the length of chain before hanging. Had to remove 4 links with a 9 ft ceiling. But, even that was easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Tallymimi

customer_reviews.title: The chandelier is beautiful. It came assembled with the exception of a ...
customer_reviews.text: Expectations met and exceeded. The chandelier is beautiful. It came assembled with the exception of a few crystals. We bought the plug in conversion kit. The only con was that the instructions for both lamp installation for both the chandelier and conversion kit made no sense. But it was not hard to figure out how to install on our own. I would definately purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Bwcky

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier looks great, however after only 6 months, it no longer works. And I don't use it every day. The on/off switch has become incredibly hard to turn on, almost like it's glued down. When the light IS on, the switch becomes burning hot, makes crackling noises and the light flickers off and on. Maybe I received a faulty one, but it seems awfully dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Cameron

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP PLASTIC
customer_reviews.text: I feel duped. Looks nothing like the pictures. Everything except the arms is made of cheap looking plastic. At least acrylic looks like glass. Not this stuff. Looks more like a toy. Would consider this for maybe a child's room. Ordered in white, a lot of the paint arrived chipped and scratched. The plastic light "bowls" had glue smeared on them and looked terrible. I've purchased other chandeliers in the sub-$100 range and they've all been good quality made of metal and glass. I don't trust all these 5 star reviews. I would choose something else.
customer_reviews.author: J916

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this, but did it because my husband insisted and now I couldn't be happier! I have it in my daughter's nursery and love how much color it brings in. Does it look like plastic? Yes, but that is not a bad thing. Everyone who sees it loves it. It is amazing for the prize and then some.
customer_reviews.author: StopEverythingToShop

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: We recently redecorated our daughter's room. This mini chandelier was the perfect fit. It was prettier than we imagined and we couldn't be more happy with it. She truly loves it. It was packaged well and it's made beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: L P

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Light for our Master Bath redo
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light fixture for the price!! We needed a chandelier for our master bath remodel. This one added just the right touch of class to our already over-budget redo. For the price, this chandelier looks great! Similar looking obese usually cost much more. I was worried it would look cheap and cheesy, but I was wrong! We are so happy with our purchase. Shipping was fast and packing was good. We bought the cabinets and shower glass at Infinite Trend in Las Vegas.
customer_reviews.author: MrLucky

customer_reviews.title: Impressive chandelier!
customer_reviews.text: I was in search of a chandelier for our daughter's bedroom that didn't look "cheap," but wasn't overly expensive either. I took a leap and went with the White 6 light chandelier by Gypsy and I must say, I'm impressed! The "crystals" are plastic but hanging in their room you'd never know! I think it's stunning and adds fun and whimsy. My husband was not excited about a chandelier, but is also loving it! It came in pieces, but must not have been overly difficult to assemble as the electrician installed it quickly and didn't complain! Their bedroom is fairly large and we also didn't add any additional lights and this chandelier provides a decent amount of lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Murray

customer_reviews.title: Buy better anchors but otherwise great product
customer_reviews.text: You might want to buy bigger anchors to mount this especially if you're not mounting into a beam - it just feels a bit heavy. I used the two hooks provided with better anchors to support the chain, and then put other smaller hook (no anchor, just screwed it) near the wall to hold the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Hiphopgroovy

customer_reviews.title: Horrible design!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this a zero, I would. The lamp is put together uneven which as a result does not hang straight. Very cheaply made and I’m so dissappointed because it was so beautiful! Now it’s just in my storage collecting dust because that’s all it’s good for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sorry, I just love them.  (Yes, I bought two.)
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the finish on the metal is cheap. Yes, the danglies are acrylic -- as stated in the listing. Yes, some of the acrylic pieces had small imperfections. Yes, it was tricky to screw into the ceiling as there was not much room for your fingers. (We used a 90-degree ratcheting screwdriver -- very helpful!) The wiring was straightforward - hot, neutral, ground; don't know what other reviewers were talking about, there. Both came with 4 extra "crystals" in each color. (Bought the blue/green unit, which is multicolored.) We love 'em!
customer_reviews.author: Private Person

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It's cute. I have a home office that I wanted to juzz up a bit and thought a little chandelier would be a nice addition. For under $100 it does the trick. I bought the 3 arm in white. Everything is plastic. I have had expensive Italian crystal chandeliers before that were a fortune and I feel this is good value at $70. Perfect for a girls bedroom or closet. I live in an apartment so I had to have a chandelier that could plug in and did not have to be hard wired in. All in all I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mippymuppett

customer_reviews.title: how wonderfully elegant and easy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a light weight, cute and kinda funky chandelier for my 5th wheel. Saw this 3 light and ordered it, hoping for the best. Got better than the best!!! I was able to put this together myself (minimal work and zero tools). I have it hanging in my house in this picture. When I get it in the camper, I'll include pics of that as well.
customer_reviews.author: horse lover

customer_reviews.title: you will find better.
customer_reviews.text: This product is decieving. I bought it based on the reviews. The things that appear to be glass are plastic. Bought two a couple of months ago as we are remodling; did not open until today. They will not allow me to return it now as I have missed the "deadline." This would work in a garage or closet. Keep looking...you will find better.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley A

customer_reviews.title: Best chandelier EVER
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this chandelier and can't say enough about the customer service! They went ABOVE AND BEYOND to help me when I needed additional chain. It's a conversation piece to say the least but I just adore it! It was fully assembled, just had to open the arms. Great product, fast shipping and again, incredible customer service
customer_reviews.author: anne tarantino

customer_reviews.title: Decent for price, despite lack of balance in swags
customer_reviews.text: I like this chandelier for the most part, however, there is a big issue that irritates my need for consistency and symmetry. The swag from the arms to the center of the light are all linked singularly to one hole, except for one hole, which has two swags to one hole. Drives me nuts, however, for the price point, it will do. It's not too bad once it's up, and unless you are looking directly up at it, most people probably wouldn't even notice it. I've attached a photo that highlights the double swag to one hole in red, and the blue circle shows the single swag to one hole. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: kdubx

customer_reviews.title: Stunning and unique
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier is fabulous. I bought it for my daughter's Boho bedroom. It is classic, classy and not trashy. I'm not a photographer and my pics do not do it justice. The colors are wonderful and adapt to many color palettes. The lights are bright enough for my visually impaired daughter but not too bright. Her room is lovely. It was easy to install where I replaced a ceiling fan. It came with enough wire and chain length to accommodate different ceiling heights. It was very easy to assemble the crystals. The delivery was faster than expected. Everyone thinks I'm a decorating genius!
customer_reviews.author: rlaffn

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest chandelier I've ever seen! It's fancy, it's the perfect amount of "extra" for our goth home, and it fits the perfectly! Breakdown: we have 9 foot ceilings and bought the 4 arm chandelier. Not too big, not too small. Easy install. Took 10 minutes. Does not come with bulbs, but bulbs from our original chandelier fit. The wiring in our home is between 47 and 77 years old, and this is not too many amps for our place. If I can figure out another place to hang one, I will be buying a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Riot Grrl

customer_reviews.title: I love this! I built a room to put it in, that is how much I love it!
customer_reviews.text: My sister has one, and I just went crazy over it. Perhaps I used to be a gypsy. It is acrylic, but you can't tell when it is hanging up. I am an artist and having a studio built on the back of my home. When I bought this Gypsy Chandelier, I had the ceiling raised to 12 ft, and I am having the chandelier installed with remote switches and dimmer. We will be able to see it when we are in the pool. I am waiting for an electrician to install, or I would have posted photos.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Conversation starter!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the six arm larger gypsy multicolored chandelier for my master bedroom. My home is older(more than 150 yrs old), with very high(about 22ft) celiengs! But my husband got up on a high ladder and took down the old ugly chandelier that was here years ago when I first bought this house and he didn't have much trouble installing this one really. And it's also very gorgeous! Most definitely a conversation piece! I had never seen a chandelier as colorful as this until I came across this one on here, but so glad I found it. It really is beautiful and unique.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal H.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Gothic Bling!
customer_reviews.text: First off, this was very easy to set up. All the crystals were in place with no fussing around. Of course, these are NOT leaded crystals and they do not spin off white light into different colors. My intention was to use Philips Hue decorator bulbs and it came out just like I wanted. The black base really sets this apart, especially with the clear "crystals" up and down each arm. It makes for a visually interesting centerpiece. I love it every day and night!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucid Spark

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Gorgeous Chandliers
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most Beautiful Chandeliers I have ever seen. It Sparkles and Glistens during the day and at night Illuminates a Gorgeous Sparkling glow. I Loved it so much I bought two and I am absolutely Pleased beyond words with these Gorgeous and Beautiful products. Excellent seller communication and quality of packing the product is unbelievable. Thank You Gypsy
customer_reviews.author: Karen J

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Instantly transforms a nursery! So whimsical! We had a dimmer installed along with it and I recommend doing the same. We got the medium 5 arm and it's definitely big enough to light a room! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Stoudt

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was not aware that this would not be coming with light bulbs lol. But the led light bulbs were on sale at my home depot so I got a set for under 10$. The room is now lit up very well and the cord was plenty long enough. It is a pretty drak room this is in and i was worried it wouldnt light up the whole space, but it does wonderfully. My daughter (1.5 years old) wakes up every morning and is excited about it. If the dangly bit look eneven make sure that the big jewels are all hanging the same way. I thought one cord was longer than the others at first. It is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jess & Phil

customer_reviews.title: Can You keep a secret?
customer_reviews.text: Can you keep a secret? No way would anyone believe the price of this beautiful, lavish piece. I can order more for other rooms. Assembly was easy, the look? Elegant, suave and sophisticated. Gives my dimly lit staircase ambiance, structure, style, and grace all for a very reasonable price...Can you keep a secret?
customer_reviews.author: SynDrella

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful "finishing touch"
customer_reviews.text: i ordered the chandelier for my daughter's "Frozen" themed princess bedroom and it adds the perfect finishing touch! The company was also very professional and emailed upon delivery as well as after it got here to make sure everything was perfect which is a nice touch of customer service in an online experience! Although the chandelier isn't made of glass, the acrylic looks beautiful (read: not cheap) and it is totally sensible for a child's room. I would definitely recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey H.

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Perfect look and fit for our entry way!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this chandelier! It is a perfect fit in our entryway. The lighting is soft white so it's so pretty at night, yet bright during the day. The white metal base is just the look I wanted in the front entrance which is shabby chic/French country. Great value! My husband put it up by himself.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen C M

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this light
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this light!! I recently remodeled my daughters room ~ Farmhouse Shabby Chic Themed. You can't have Shabby Chic without a Chandelier, so I purchased the 3 light plug in and it fits perfectly in a nook/desk/makeup area. I absolutely love the way it looks and more importantly my daughter loves it too!! Since I had no electric in the ceiling there, I hung using a basic swag lamp hook and then ran the extra wire thru an inexpensive cord hider attached to the ceiling and down the wall to the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love this fixture. Initially I was hesitant, because it is plastic but it is gorgeous. The plug-in gave me an easy fix to a dark corner. FYI....I originally purchased 40w bulbs, but they were really bright and super hot. I ended up buying LED Amber bulbs which gives a warm, soft glow. Very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted a chandelier for her room and I didn't want to spend a fortune but didn't want a cheap piece of crap either. This was a great choice!! Price was right and it looks fabulous! It is definitely more plastic than metal and my husband had a rough time installing it because the wire kept twisting up, but overall, it looks great and was well worth the price! Shipping time was insane, like 2 days, if that. My daughter is happy and it adds a little glam to her room!
customer_reviews.author: micnlin

customer_reviews.title: Its nothing special
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. Doesn't look expensive by any means, rather cheap actually. It was very frustrating that the wires were not labeled properly. Seriously people? The chain is waaaaayyyyy tooooo looooong. My husband shortened it. Installation was simple, after he figured out which wire was which! Thankfully he chose correctly and no circuits were blown. Customer service was rather rude when I emailed them to ask which wire was which. Thet actually told us the opposite of which wire was which, but thankfully I hadn't read their reply until after we installed it!
customer_reviews.author: SweetAndSalty

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Sssssso kool...fits purrrrfectly in my bohemian style home...I bought flicker bulbs from home depot and it looks like candle light flames flickering...real pretty...ambient lighting. Love the price and it is made sturdy well crafted great colors.
customer_reviews.author: whispy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, looks great! Added shades.
customer_reviews.text: This came quickly and in great shape. It was missing a hanging crystal, but I shifted some around and it works. Being high quality it is heavy, so keep that in mind while mounting hooks (included). I bought small lamp shades from hobby lobby and love this! Make sure you buy small Chandelier shades that are no bigger than 4'' or 4 1/2'' in height. The "candle stick" isn't that tall and would be lost with taller shades.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly the chandelier I was looking to add to my bedroom. But when it arrived it had no chord allowing me to plug it in, it could only be hardwired. Every picture in th description shows a chord. I did reach out to the Seller but never heard back and the item has been returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of my best decisions!
customer_reviews.text: I had to bribe my daughter to switch to top bunk and sweetened the deal with this chandelier... well, she absolutely loves it! It was ridiculously easy to hang; it even came with hooks, but I bought a prettier ornate white one that Amazon suggested and went up in minutes. I had a tiny bit of trouble getting the cups over the light posts and called the number on the instructions and heard back from the owner of the company within minutes. I got incredible service and communication and a beautiful light at a really good price.
customer_reviews.author: NativeNYC

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE!! Perfection! Sophisticated in every way!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE!!!! I’ve had my chandler for about 5 years now!! (Didn’t even know) and it’s still in Excellent condition!!!! Pictures don't explain how beautiful this chandelier has become the center piece in my home! (Exactly like advertised pic) Package arrived on-time, packaging was extremely protective of the delicate product and compact. My electrician installed the chandelier in about 35 mins. I used 25W bulbs that was recommended from the sales person at the hardware store and I have plenty of glamorous lighting. I would definitely refer a friend or family member. All pro's no cons wish I had space to install another!
customer_reviews.author: LeeDC02

customer_reviews.title: Hauntingly Beautifuk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an outdoor Halloween party. I must have missed that it wasn’t a plug in but hubby quickly added a plug end to it. It made the event magical. We hung it from a tree and used a Humless battery generator to run it. You literally open the box and spread the arms, add the cups and lightbulbs and it is ready to create magic.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 3 chandalier in white. I was hesitant at first because it was $60, but it had a lot of good reviews so I just decided to buy it. I was very disappointed. A lot of the gems were disconnected and I am unsure of where they are suppose to hook onto. Also the white is all scuffed up and black which looks awful. I am stuck with it now but my suggestion is to not even bother buying this spend a little more money and get something nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Look, cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't possibly be cuter for my daughter's She Shed. Really added a bit of glam. Like other reviews have said though, it is lots of plastic, but it's fine for a a room in a barn. Seems a bit pricey for plastic, imo, but, it's pink and large and what I found. Would still buy it again, 100% Also bought adapter to make it in to a plug in. That was also very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: mrsh

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a million bucks for a fraction of the price :)
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged and easy to install. This chandelier looks GORGEOUS. it makes the room look like a million bucks. It does look like something from very fancy decor store and you get it for a fraction of the price. I love that it is black, it gives such a nice accent toy bedroom. I did a lot of research and I was so so pleased when I found this. Even more pleased after it was installed.
customer_reviews.author: Debora B

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My daughter asked for this chandelier for her birthday. It is a lot heavier than I expected and well made. It is elegant and solidly designed. You will need a molly bolt to mount it in the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Inness-Brown

customer_reviews.title: Add some shining sparkle to your home
customer_reviews.text: This is the best buy for the money. I have always wanted a chandelier to lighten up our 20 foot high ceiling. This takes away the dark corners and hangs like a jewel of flashing color. Well made, better than expected, in fact much better than expected. The company is a father daughter operation and each piece is hand-made. Can't say enough good things about how wonderful this chandelier is. Customer service is personal and responsive. I need an extra six feet of chain and it was sent out promptly. Highly recommend and thinking of buying a larger one for the dining room.
customer_reviews.author: Anne  Macpherson

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: This is such an adorable little chandelier! The colours are so pretty and vibrant, and the whole thing really pops in my boho/country kitchen. I am using these 15 watt silicone dipped bulbs ( and the effect is just gorgeous. This is a great value lamp, easy to set up, and very pleasing to the eye. I don't understand the reviewers complaining that the 'crystals' are acrylic when it clearly states so. If you want a multi colour cut crystal chandelier be prepared to spend $$$. I highly recommend this little chandelier!
customer_reviews.author: MMMandy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chandelier
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier is incredible! I loved it. It was easy to assemble and beautiful! I used as stage decoration for a concert and everyone was talking and complimenting it! The size, quality and details are beautiful. I do recomend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ivelisse Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Plastic crystals, has manufacturing flaws
customer_reviews.text: This item is made of plastic 'crystals'. The lamp arms are a little bent making one light slightly lower than the others even though hanging perfectly plumb. There is a flaw on one of the pieces that looks like a chip. Arrived this way. It is cute and my children like it but i dont think it is worth more than $30 or $40.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve Smith

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light....
customer_reviews.text: We recently moved into our new townhouse and found that the pantry had no light nor a light switch. Luckily there was an outlet on the back wall. Instead of a standard 2-bulb plug in light, we decided on something unique for the pantry. I painted the ceiling metallic silver first and then mounted the chandelier. I added a dimmer switch to control the brightness of the 4 LED bulbs. It looks great and very easy to mount. I gave this 5 stars because one of the arms is slightly bent but not enough for me to return.
customer_reviews.author: Cigar Dave

customer_reviews.title: You be the judge
customer_reviews.text: My man handled the job and made a number of trips to the hardware store. We were almost defeated by the connection problems due to unmarked wires but kept at it. I then exchanged the more visible acrylic pendants for glass. This was bought used like new, and with the medallion, paint, fixative, hardware and pendants, the total cost was under 200 dollars. It is having the desired effect on the energy people bring into my house, which is generally a bit insubstantial for my tastes.
customer_reviews.author: Flawedplan

customer_reviews.title: Sexy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I got black 3 lights (plug in). This chandelier gave my bedroom a sexy vibe and great accent as well. I got selling hock from amazon that gave it more stable situation (since I put it side of my bed). I’ll get a clear one for my foyer area soon:-)
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: I liked this gypsy chandelier so much I ordered another one!
customer_reviews.text: It is so whimsical and crazy looking! I just love mine! I initially ordered the 4 bulb for my covered porch and then ended up buying the 6 bulb for the kitchen. I was shocked to see how large the 6 bulb is! It is really quite large and beautiful. I use the candelabra led flame bulbs in them and they look just like candles burning. Absolutely beautiful, especially at night!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Galan

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Medium 5 arm for an 11 x 12 room and it's perfect. Its for my spoiled 3 1/2 yr old granddaughter who I rescued and adopted. She's a climbing monkey so bought her a bunk bed and realized the ceiling fan had to come down! My adult son installed this light, had it up in about 20 minutes. He cut the metal rod loop off and removed most of the chain to raise the light since it was going next to the bunk bed ladder. It's really cute, mostly plastic but fun and unique for a girls room. I got small base candelabra bulbs at 40 watts each, very bright. Photo attached.
customer_reviews.author: Carols Critters

customer_reviews.title: I'm so in love! I bought the Large 6 light black chandalier ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm so in love! I bought the Large 6 light black chandalier for my bedroom. It came super fast and in a lightweight package. Literally all you have to do is unfold the chandalier and install the wires. I usually install wires myself but I would recommend having someone help you as you will need someone to hold the chandalier and one person to install the wires. All in all I'm 100% satisfied with the price , shipping , quality and easy installation of this product .
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful !
customer_reviews.text: This is a really pretty light for the money. It’s a bubble gum pink color. It was easy to install and basically already put together when it comes. We put it in about a 12x12 room which will be my granddaughters playroom. It’s plenty enough light with 40 watt bulbs installed. I couldn’t be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: JOHNNY

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in 3 light white, and love it. It was the perfect touch to add to my 11 yr Olds room to bring in some extra sparkle. Great product, very happy with my purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: TNRollins

customer_reviews.title: Finishing touch
customer_reviews.text: Did my office in old hollywood. Put one of these each of my two desks. They were the absolute finishing touch to my home office. Its old hollywood theme. The look stunning. Great price, came fast, well made.
customer_reviews.author: annmarie

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of those to hang under my enclosed gazebo, & they add just the right amount of sparkle & glam for my boho hippie backyard vibe! They’re lightweight & don’t look or feel cheap, but luxe!! I think they’re my favorite thing so far. (The tapestries aren’t staying like that, so please avert your eyes, lol; I’m still in the process of adjusting the look & feel of the room) *See my reviews on the tapestries too. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B.

customer_reviews.title: Black chandelier looks stunning
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters room and when I saw the box and the plastic I was nervous it would look cheap, but it's truly GORGEOUS. Great value, great price and looks better that I ever could imagine. The extra ceiling medallion is a must. It makes it more elegant. My husband and I installed it ourselves, which took about an hour (installer error), but it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Theplaidskirt

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It is absolutely stunning. I have gotten so many compliments on the chandelier and everyone wants one.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana Scheibmeir

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Black Chandlier
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lighting for my teenage son room. EXTRA LONG PLUG IN CORD FOR THE WALL OUTLET . I REALLY LOVE THIS BLACK CHANDLIER A REALLY GREAT PURCHASE FOR ANYONE MALE OR FEMALE.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: The light itself is great and the cord is a good length for hanging
customer_reviews.text: The light itself is great and the cord is a good length for hanging. I do wish they would have included a lot more chain (doesn't look right when the chain just stops at the hook, imo) and the switch is really close to the plug, making it awkward to use to turn the light on and off. I just bought a wireless outlet switch to solve the switch issue and longer white chain from the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Annmarie

customer_reviews.title: A 2nd person to help would make install easier.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to install but its wise to have a 2nd person to help. I did it alone so was harder. Plus I had to improvise some because it was suppose to come with 2 different mounting brackets. Mine did but they were both identical. I ended up using the one that what used with old light fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Mongor

customer_reviews.title: Chip Chip Hooray!
customer_reviews.text: Truly think this is a great company unfortunately the product received was subpar. Since I wanted this to be a focal point in the room I was hoping that it would be free from imperfections. The bottom portion was scratched and chipped. I sent for a replacement thinking I had received a lemon however received a comparable product. I so love the colors that I am debating about returning it and giving it a chance one last time. Who knows? Third times the charm? If you’re detailed oriented perfectionist do not buy. If you’re okay with a few scuffs and don’t mind a chip or two this is a great find with fun colors.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This company has the most amazing customer service ever. I received this on Friday. Sent an email on Saturday and then spent the weekend emailing with the owner of the company. The ground wire was missing from the direct connect one I received. My husband ended up added one and we got it installed. Light is beautiful. Yes, it's not glass. Does not detract from it at all in my opinion and looks so amazing in my teenage daughters room that I'm getting another one for my room. This is just beautiful at a very affordable price and very easy to install once we figured out the ground issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and Amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I am very HAPPY with my purchase. The chandelier is perfect. I had a slight issuse with a small jewel missing. I contacted company via email (such a small piece and was in no rush) and i got a reply within the hour. The piece was sent ASAP. Communication the entire time. FYI, one piece missing, sent 4. The product is wonderful and the price is great. I truly LOVE the costumer service. I wish I could give more stars.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this chandelier. So easy to put together . Though it is plastic . it looks expensive. Great price. And I converted it to plug in and bought there converter kit. So easy!
customer_reviews.author: Mishelle

customer_reviews.title: Seller/supplier is top notch!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the 3 light but it arrived with a small defect and then we decided on a bigger light. The 4 light is available as a swag with plug in and it has a toggle on/off switch. The light was very easy to put together and fills our space perfectly. I also want to mention that the seller is fantastic to work with! Very responsive and accommodating, even forfeiting asking us to return the first (that came with a scrape along one of the sides) and avoiding the long lines at ups at Christmastime. This is a good product and is represented well on Amazon. Will post a photo soon.
customer_reviews.author: busybee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Finishing Touch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for over my granddaughter’s bed as we just redecorated her room and there was a hook already in place that had previously been used for a “canopy”. Item is pretty. Be advised it is not glass! Which is actually is better for this purpose. Very pretty and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: grammy

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice 3 lamp very nice light when installed with quality bulbs - good cord length not as easy to adjust 3 arms for all crystals to look even just some trial error but great value and very functional brighter than expected - quality 4 out of 5. Fast shipping. Would recommend for swing arm style for Sure.
customer_reviews.author: E J

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The chandelier is stunning and installation was pretty easy. The one thing my husband and I noticed was the chain links are not made well and break apart easily when trying to shorten the chain. I also wished the mounting rod was smaller so we could have placed the chandelier higher as we do not have tall celings in our daughters nursery. Other than that the chandelier is great! We really liked that it shipped folded up so we didn't have to hang all the crystals manually. The crystals are plastic but still look beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: christa d

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect👍
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! We love these sweet chandeliers. They are so precious and add that charm to a bedroom. It really adds that little personality to a plain room. I'd recommend these adorable chandeliers to anyone - and we live in a very nice custom home we just finished building. No need to spend a ton of money - I love these!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty - Not Glass But Didn't Expect it At this Price
customer_reviews.text: I am taking one star away for quality of the pieces. Do not expect "crystal" at this price. However, this thing looks BEAUTIFUL once you install it. If you are not electrically inclined, I would say you will need someone who is adept to hardwire it. It was pretty easy to put it together. This is perfect for the room I am putting together for my mom. It is not too big, but substantial enough to make an impact in the room. The bed is a full size in my pictures. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Really cute! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this chandelier! Very pretty pink.. just like the picture. My husband installed the light. It took him about 45 min and he said it was very easy. The pink “crystals” are plastic. Which I didnt mind. Still very pretty. A couple pieces around center bar are real glass. In one of my pictures you can see there was a small dent at the base. Nothing big enough to make me return it. My daughter loves it though!!
customer_reviews.author: ErinMM24

customer_reviews.title: Easy travel, buy your 3 bulbs at Lowe’s
customer_reviews.text: Enough lighting!!! I was upset when I first saw it but when we put it on ... omg beautiful!!!! Love it!! Need to buy some more !!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: this chandelier is a cute and smaller sized. Easy to assemble and hang. Nice for a little corner in a room or baby's room looks elegant as well as affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Luann

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Darn Cool...
customer_reviews.text: We had it hung up temporarily within an hour of it being delivered. And the next day, even with only two bulbs, we knew we liked it. It hangs in our new outdoor kitchen over the sink. I have already installed a dedicated wall dimmer switch for it and we are waiting anxiously to see what it looks like dimmed to various moods. It's gotta be pretty because the lady folks are already telling us its pretty. And some guys are saying its pretty darn cool (that's guy talk for 'pretty.'
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can' wait til she opens it on Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait until my 9 year old granddaughter opens this on Christmas so I'll see how beautiful it really is. The box the shipment arrived in was completely undamaged, but the inside box that the chandelier was packaged in, was crushed on one end. Obviously crushed in before it was packaged in the shipping container. I am anxious to see it after it is received as a gift and put together. Looking forward to it being beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Very Colorful, Super Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the color. Some scuffing in the acrylic dangly bits because acrylic was rubbing together during shipping, but not noticable once mounted. Stunning once lit. Very ample cord, was surprised as to how long it is. Would definitely recommend for anyone looking to fancy up a small area.
customer_reviews.author: Very Moon

customer_reviews.title: Turned out perfect and beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier made me extremely nervous when unboxing it. It looked very small and honestly it looked VERY cheap. But after putting it together and getting it installed it was ABSOLUTELY beautiful and perfect in size!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Putnam

customer_reviews.title: Not a beginner project
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t catch that this didn’t come with the light bulbs which are a bit pricey on their own. The instructions are pretty terrible so you need to know what you’re doing this isn’t an install for someone whose never done anything like it before. My husband got by with his knowledge from changing out ceiling fans but it was very trial and error. Mine also came with some scratches to it that we decided just to touch up on our own versus dealing with a return.
customer_reviews.author: KRader

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who steps into my home absolutely loves this chandelier. It’s funky, super unique and wicked sparkly. I have to say that their customer service is unmatched as they will go above and beyond to make sure you’re happy. I will definitely be doing business with them again in the future. So pleased, beyond!
customer_reviews.author: Michael L

customer_reviews.title: Add punch of color
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier is perfect and adds a much needed punch of color for my eggshell walls. I love how the prisms bounce the light off the walls when the chandelier is on. It throws off a surprisingly good amount of light for such a small chandalier. I love it and have received many compliments .
customer_reviews.author: Jamie M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these, one for each one of my girls rooms, and they are beautiful!! Arrived quickly and packaged nicely. No need to put together which was a huge plus and my husband hung them without any issues. Everyone asks where I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Roeder

customer_reviews.title: Big and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: There was some annoyance with shipping but I got it safely. I absolutely love it. It was easy to put together. All my clients love it. It’s just so beautiful 😍 and it’s big I researched the size over and over lol I’m terrible at buying this stuff and it not being the right size and I’m so happy with it. Get it. You won’t regret it
customer_reviews.author: Kayla S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this chandelier I bought The Plug in kit to go as well . It was slightly challenging to convert it to the plug-in directions were very clear . But I did figure it out the hardest part was getting the cover to hide the cord . The screws very difficult . Overall after I get it all put together I love it but all the pain and struggle Was worth it
customer_reviews.author: Tisarah McGowan

customer_reviews.title: only one bulb works
customer_reviews.text: not working properly. we tried in different location only one bulb works. if we try another bulb, the other bulb trip. we switch around all the bulb in different socket but it can only handle one bulb to work. we have to remove the other bulbs and just retain one light. we even try to connect the chandelier to diiferent location but still same issue. only one bulb works.
customer_reviews.author: Chu

customer_reviews.title: Best Little Girl's Light Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best light ever for a little girl's room! Hung it in the corner over a little desk as the space was a little dark for crafts and reading. Now it is perfect! Instructions say you can use up to 3 40 watt bulbs, but I used 15 watt bulbs and it is absolutely perfect. Not too bright, but lights the space. Would be perfect over a bedside table or in a closet or dressing room. The "crystals" are bright and clear and not at all cheap looking. Quality built! Comes packaged in a flat box and all you do is extend the arms, screw in the hanging hook and plug it in! Could not have been easier.
customer_reviews.author: AGS

customer_reviews.title: Love it, it's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this Chandelier!!! It is just what I hoped for. I am using it with a dimmer by Caseta lutron, that has a remote control. It is perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jphillips

customer_reviews.title: The lights are crooked.
customer_reviews.text: The lights flash a little bit on low dimmer. The lights are not even across. That is a bummer. It would have cost me more to ship it back.but it really is cute and because it's quirky I can get away with crooked lights, I think.
customer_reviews.author: V. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little chandelier as an accent to my bay window. Looks so pretty from the inside and outside in the window. A little difficult attaching the crystals to the light but worth it. The instructions could be more explicit.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this .I have 2 black and one blue. I put one outside in a covered gazebo.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Bedroom Accent
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the BLACK 4-arm chandelier and couldn't be happier with how it dazzles my bedroom. Very lovely statement piece!!! The black 6-arm chandelier was out-of-stock and I was worried that the 4-arm would look too small for my room. However it is the PERFECT size, the price was very reasonable and the quality is fair. I had a professional install it for $40 bucks... and haven't been able to take my eyes off it since.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but its messed up!
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved this today. Of course I'm excited to see it and put it up. As I removed the chandelier from the plastic the first thing I see was the scratches and dent on 4 arms. I contact the seller right away because I am very disappointed for $100 something I was expecting a decent and well structured chandelier. Hence the condition its in right now its very pretty. I juat wished we got one in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Kriselle Torres

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and use.
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect light for my hallway. Easy to set up. Love the on off switch on the long cord. Light weight, simple.yet elegant. No electrician necessary. YOU can do this!!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonGirl

customer_reviews.title: Bigger then expected
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant looking and very easy to put up I’m in love with it it match’s my hall of mirrors picture ❤️❤️❤️ Just wish it came with light bulbs because I only had one on hand until I get some tomorrow but love it anyway
customer_reviews.author: Denzel Mcclinton

customer_reviews.title: Classy and great size!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this light. Such a great addition to my living room. I bought extremely dim lights- 15watt bulbs just to add a little bit of light to my room. I highly suggest this light for a feminine touch to a room. Great quality, classy, and the pictures advertised don't do it justice!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Not the highest quality of material but for the price well worth it. Insulation was the same as any other chandelier. With the right light bulbs it really brightens up the room. My six year old daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: niffer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to brighten up any space.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a rental to class it up a bit, and it totally worked. For a much cheaper price than the ones available at hardware stores, this little chandelier gives an amazing amount of light and (I think) looks more expensive than it actually is. For reference, the one I got (and is in the picture) is the clear color.
customer_reviews.author: Eztli

customer_reviews.title: Designed for four not for five!
customer_reviews.text: I like the light. It's charming enough but difficult to install. My biggest issue is that I bought the FIVE bulb unit and it is ONLY designed for FOUR bulbs. As a result the beaded chains that should hang to their own location do NOT. Five chains have to share four holes and it is TACKY. TACKY. TACKY! So I wonder, does the THREE light also share FOUR holes. If you want the light, choose FOUR bulbs because that it what it is designed for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Our little rainbow for our little Oasis that we created...😄
customer_reviews.author: CELEST

product_meta.title: The Original 3 Light Crystal White Plug-in Gypsy Chandelier for H17" W12", White Metal Frame with Clear Acrylic Crystals (Better Than Glass)
feature_bullets: THE ULTIMATE SWAG LIGHT - This adorable, mini chandelier is the perfect accent light for any location or occasion. Our customers continue to amaze us with where they use our versatile plug-in swag light including a nursery, bedroom, bathroom, closet, hallway, stairwell, "she shed", event tent, wedding alter, gazebo & even a tack room! It's elegant, suave & sophisticated at an affordable price. The 3 arms give plenty of light (bulbs not included). Possibilities are limitless with this little gem!
VERY STRONG & LIGHT WEIGHT- we use poly-carbonate (PC) crystals which is the same material as bullet proof windows and eye lenses, light and strong. Better Than Glass!
SMART PACKAGING- PC crystals allow us to ship chandeliers with arms folded flat, almost fully assembled, with much less packaging, weight, damage and waste.
EASY TO ASSEMBLE- simply unfold the arms, connect a few beads and this light weight chandelier is ready to hang with ease.
UL CERTIFIED highest standard quality and safety, 16 feet cord plugs directly into a wall socket, nice alternative to table lamps or standing lamps

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,781 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
